grants.name: NEA Our Town Grant
grants.description: Supporting creative placemaking projects that integrate arts, culture, and design activities into efforts that strengthen communities.

grants.name: NEA Art Works Grant
grants.description: Supports public engagement with, and access to, various forms of art across the nation.

grants.name: California Arts Council State-Local Partnership
grants.description: Supporting local arts agencies in addressing community needs through the arts.

grants.name: California Arts Council Artists in Communities
grants.description: Supporting artist residencies in community settings.

grants.name: San Francisco Arts Commission Individual Artist Grant
grants.description: Supporting individual artists in creating and presenting new works in San Francisco.

grants.name: San Francisco Arts Commission Cultural Equity Grant
grants.description: Supporting arts organizations that serve historically marginalized communities.

grants.name: Hewlett Foundation Performing Arts Program
grants.description: Supporting performing arts organizations in the Bay Area.

grants.name: Kenneth Rainin Foundation Arts Grant
grants.description: Supporting experimental and innovative projects in the performing arts.

grants.name: Zellerbach Family Foundation
grants.description: Supporting performing arts projects and organizations in the Bay Area.

grants.name: Silicon Valley Community Foundation Arts Grant
grants.description: Supporting arts and cultural organizations in Silicon Valley and the Bay Area.
